The Half Blind Hecklers

Who Are We?

Stephen Green

Teetering on Libertarian philosophy, Stephen Green is a socially conservative Christian who is passionite about gun rights and freedom of speech.

Tait Hoyem (The Blind One)

A pro-life atheist, Tait Hoyem is a social liberal who believes in 'live and let live'. Tait is passionite about the state of government surveillance.
